product_name: GORE BIKE WEAR Contest Lady 3/4+ Bike Tights - Women's
long_description: The GORE BIKE WEAR Contest Lady 3/4+ bike tights are impressive performers for both racing and casual riding. With high elasticity and solid support, the 4-way stretch nylon blend moves naturally. Anatomic design offers a flawless fit and supports muscles during all-day rides; compression in fabric promotes active muscle recovery. Ultrasoft, breathable chamois is fully elasticized for added flex and stretch. Chamois features a microfiber covering that wicks moisture away; ergonomic shaping and smooth, flatlock seams reduce friction. Women-specific chamois uses high-density foam in targeted areas to provide support without bulkiness. Elastic grippers at leg hems hold Contest Lady 3/4+ bike tights in place. Small mesh pocket at back stashes keys and an energy gel. Reflective elements help keep you visible in low light.
short_description: The GORE BIKE WEAR Contest Lady 3/4+ bike tights are impressive performers for both racing and casual riding.
